page.title: 01LIFE ON DANESHOLME
page.content:
I live on the estate called Danesholme .I live at 53 Norse Walk.It is a part of the old part of Danesholme.It is on the outskirts near Copenhagon Road.Near my house is the new shops. There is the library,newsagents,the chemist,the Co-op,an Off Licence and a pub.Life is pretty easy going because the school,shops and bus stops are very near.The estate is quite new.The school is very good because it has a lot of different things going on.There are clubs for children,scouts and cubs down at te old farm house.There is a park with swings and a good adventure course.Life is very nice on Danesholme.We have got friendly and helpful neighbours.We all get on well.
Occaissionally some stupid people come and cause trouble and do damage to the area,sometimes the police come.
